changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [DOFR].[GetServiceCategoryForClinicCode] @FacilityId int, @ClinicCode varchar(20) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; ;WITH CTE AS ( SELECT [FacilityId],LTRIM(RTRIM(UPPER(ITEM))) as [ClinicCode],UPPER([ServiceCategory]) as [ServiceCategory],[ServiceCategoryCode] FROM [DOFR].[ServiceCategory] CROSS APPLY [Utility].[ArrayToTable]([Utility].[StringToArray]([ClinicCode],',')) WHERE [FacilityID] = @FacilityId ) SELECT [ServiceCategory],[ServiceCategoryCode] FROM CTE WHERE ClinicCode = UPPER(@ClinicCode) END
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON [DOFR].[GetServiceCategoryForClinicCode] FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE [DOFR].[GetServiceCategoryForClinicCode];
